column4: I've installed ubuntu. what should I put in mu menu.lst to be able to boot it ?
how did u install it
with the cdrom
what is the problem now
I didn't install grub because it was already there
do u have live cd or alternative cd
what's the difference ?
did u do a fresh gutsy install
I installed from the livecd
if u install with live cd it will install grub automatically
no, I told the installer not to install grub
are u not able to booot now wht is the problem
yes, I can't boot my new ubuntu (but I can boot my other distros)
can you give me the contents of your /boot/grub/menu.lst file ?
can someone give me his /boot/grub/menu.lst file ?
http://pastebin.com/m738b74f3
there u go
ok, thanks
but best thing is to re install the grub it will automaticaly recognize the other distros  gribouille
did you modify your /boot/grub/menu.lst file ?
yes its modified
just reinstall grub ok
